programme.title: The sovereignty of Hong Kong.
programme.short_synopsis: How the US see the transfer of sovereignty of Hong Kong back to China.
programme.medium_synopsis: The US take on the  handover of Hong Kong to the Chinese in July 1997, the ceremony accompanying the transfer of power, and the Chinese hopes for a peaceful return of Taiwan.

programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
